scripts.build:prod:darwin:linux: pnpm cleanup && pnpm copy:assets && pnpm install:mvnw && run-script-if --bool "$(build-env containerImages.build)" --then "pnpm podman:build"
scripts.podman:build:
run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build --ulimit nofile=5000:5000 $(echo $(build-env openJdk11MvnImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env openJdk11MvnImageEnv.registry)/$(build-env openJdk11MvnImageEnv.account)/$(build-env openJdk11MvnImageEnv.name):%s
" | xargs echo) --build-arg OKD_VERSION=$(build-env openJdk11MvnImage.okdVersion) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
